findings.title: Reward: Check miner code CID
findings.description: The finding suggests checking the miner code CID to ensure its correctness and validity.

findings.title: Verifreg.UseBytes: is newVcCap permanently lost if it’s smaller than MinVerifiedDealSize
findings.description: If newVcCap is smaller than MinVerifiedDealSize, there's a risk of permanent loss.

findings.title: Power.OnConsensusFault: Assert is non-negative pledgeAmount
findings.description: The Power.OnConsensusFault function does not properly check if the pledgeAmount is non-negative, which can lead to potential issues.

findings.title: Miner.ReportConsensusFault: possible incorrect constraints on faultAge
findings.description: Possible incorrect constraints on faultAge in Miner.ReportConsensusFault function.

findings.title: Miner control functions should abort on no-op
findings.description: The miner control functions do not properly handle no-operation scenarios, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Miner control functions should abort for empty params
findings.description: The miner control functions do not properly handle empty parameters, which can lead to unexpected behavior or errors.

findings.title: Miner: NewDeadlineInfo may calculate negative Challenge and FaultCutoff epochs during irst ~70 epochs
findings.description: NewDeadlineInfo function may incorrectly calculate Challenge and FaultCutoff epochs resulting in negative values during the first ~70 epochs.

findings.title: Miner: Remove references to variable seal proof types
findings.description: Remove references to variable seal proof types in Miner contract.

findings.title: Miner: bubble up error in processEarlyTerminations
findings.description: The finding indicates an issue with error handling in the processEarlyTerminations function of the Miner contract.

findings.title: Miner: Remove state.Transaction where not needed
findings.description: Remove unnecessary state transactions to optimize code and prevent potential issues.

findings.title: Miner: Correct for potential overflow when iterating over multiaddresses
findings.description: Potential overflow when iterating over multiaddresses may occur.

findings.title: Miner.Partition: Check sector existence on expiry and termination
findings.description: The finding suggests checking sector existence when it expires or is terminated to prevent potential issues.

findings.title: Miner.handleProvingDeadline: Check that method is being run at the correct time
findings.description: The Miner.handleProvingDeadline method may not be executed at the correct time, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Miner.ExpirationQueue: Additional invariants
findings.description: The audit report suggests implementing additional invariants to ensure correctness and security of the ExpirationQueue mechanism in the Miner contract.

findings.title: Miner.ExpirationQueue: Enforce methods are passed unique sets of sectors
findings.description: Enforce methods in Miner.ExpirationQueue to ensure they receive unique sets of sectors.

findings.title: Multisig: Allow proposals of batches of calls to enable complex actions
findings.description: Allowing proposals of batches of calls can potentially enable complex actions.

findings.title: Miner Policy: Correct truncating division
findings.description: Potential loss of precision due to incorrect order of operations in division.

findings.title: Miner: Add balance invariant checks to cron methods
findings.description: Add balance invariant checks to cron methods in Miner contract to prevent potential balance inconsistencies.
